title: Vice President for Administration & Finance Search Committee Update: Four Finalists Selected for Campus Forums - UHD News
content: Vice President for Administration & Finance Search Committee Update: Four Finalists Selected for Campus Forums  UHD News
description: Dear UHD Community,The Vice President for Administration & Finance Search Committee is pleased to announce that we have narrowed the list of candidates for the University of Houston-Downtown’s next member of senior leadership. We have invited four finalists for on-campus visits this month.This integral position supports UHD’s commitment to s...
